 Formula-building rule for 2 existential quantifiers (deduction rule). (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-1997.)
statement:
2albidv.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
2albidv $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x A. y ps <-> A. x A. y ch ) ) $.
$d ph x $.
$d ph y $.
